verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> and of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> [who is] our <S%G1680>hope;<s%>

to <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> [my] <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> in [the] <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace,<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> [and] <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

As I <S%G3870>urged<s%> you upon my <S%G4198>departure<s%> for <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G4357>remain<s%> on at <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G3853>instruct<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5100>men<s%> not to <S%G2085>teach<s%> <S%G2085>strange<s%> <S%G2085>doctrines,<s%>

<S%G3366>nor<s%> to <S%G4337>pay<s%> <S%G4337>attention<s%> to <S%G3454>myths<s%> and <S%G562>endless<s%> <S%G1076>genealogies,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3930>give<s%> <S%G3930>rise<s%> to mere <S%G7058>speculation<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> [furthering] the <S%G3622>administration<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is by <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

But the <S%G5056>goal<s%> of our <S%G3852>instruction<s%> is <S%G26>love<s%> from a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> and a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> and a <S%G505>sincere<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5100>men,<s%> <S%G795>straying<s%> from <S%G3739>these<s%> <S%G3739>things,<s%> have <S%G1624>turned<s%> <S%G1624>aside<s%> to <S%G3150>fruitless<s%> <S%G3150>discussion,<s%>

<S%G2309>wanting<s%> to be <S%G3547>teachers<s%> of the <S%G3547>Law,<s%> even though they do not <S%G3539>understand<s%> <S%G3383>either<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> they are <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> the matters <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> they <S%G1226>make<s%> <S%G1226>confident<s%> <S%G1226>assertions.<s%>
But we <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G3551>Law<s%> is <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G5530>uses<s%> it <S%G3545>lawfully,<s%>

<S%G3609>realizing<s%> the <S%G3778>fact<s%> that <S%G3551>law<s%> is not <S%G2749>made<s%> for a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>man,<s%> but for those who are <S%G459>lawless<s%> and <S%G506>rebellious,<s%> for the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> and <S%G268>sinners,<s%> for the <S%G462>unholy<s%> and <S%G952>profane,<s%> for those who <S%G3970>kill<s%> <S%G3389><s%> their <S%G3970>fathers<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G3389>mothers,<s%> for <S%G409>murderers<s%>

and <S%G4205>immoral<s%> <S%G4205>men<s%> and <S%G733>homosexuals<s%> and <S%G405>kidnappers<s%> and <S%G5583>liars<s%> and <S%G1965>perjurers,<s%> and <S%G1487>whatever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2087>else<s%> is <S%G480>contrary<s%> to <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>teaching,<s%>
<S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> I have been <S%G4100>entrusted.<s%>

I <S%G5485>thank<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> who has <S%G1743>strengthened<s%> me, <S%G3754>because<s%> He <S%G2233>considered<s%> me <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> <S%G5087>putting<s%> me into <S%G1248>service;<s%>

even though I was <S%G4387>formerly<s%> a <S%G989>blasphemer<s%> and a <S%G1376>persecutor<s%> and a <S%G5197>violent<s%> <S%G5197>aggressor.<s%> And <S%G235>yet<s%> I was <S%G1653>shown<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4160>acted<s%> <S%G50>ignorantly<s%> in <S%G570>unbelief;<s%>

and the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G5250>more<s%> <S%G5250>than<s%> <S%G5250>abundant,<s%> with the <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G26>love<s%> which are [found] in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

It is a <S%G4103>trustworthy<s%> <S%G3056>statement,<s%> <S%G514>deserving<s%> <S%G3956>full<s%> <S%G594>acceptance,<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> into the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> among <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4413>foremost<s%> [of all.]

And <S%G235>yet<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> I <S%G1653>found<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that in me as the <S%G4413>foremost,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> might <S%G1731>demonstrate<s%> His <S%G537>perfect<s%> <S%G3115>patience,<s%> as an <S%G5296>example<s%> for <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him for <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to the <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G165>eternal,<s%> <S%G862>immortal,<s%> <S%G517>invisible,<s%> the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> [be] <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3852>command<s%> I <S%G3908>entrust<s%> to you, <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> my <S%G5043>son,<s%> in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with the <S%G4394>prophecies<s%> <S%G4254>previously<s%> <S%G4254>made<s%> <S%G1909>concerning<s%> you, that by them you may <S%G4754>fight<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4752>fight,<s%>

<S%G2192>keeping<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> and a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> have <S%G683>rejected<s%> and <S%G3489>suffered<s%> <S%G3489>shipwreck<s%> in <S%G4012>regard<s%> to their <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

Among <S%G3739>these<s%> are <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> and <S%G223>Alexander,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> to <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that they may be <S%G3811>taught<s%> not to <S%G987>blaspheme.<s%>
